name: Lab Escape of the Terrifying Blob
name_original: Lab Escape of the Terrifying Blob
description:
The controls are all explained in-game (more or less)

You are a terrifying, definitely-not-super-cute, very dangerous blob monster!  You must escape from the lab they keep you in captivity in!  Remember that, as a blob, you are very modular, and can change your stats at will to whatever you need them to be.  Good Luck!
